attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the introduction of Fermanagh as a free state there would be a radication of all forms of tax and in doing so would create buisness and tourism throughout the Free state.
We would encourage tradtions such as the mummers and various other Fermanagh based traditions.

rejection.details:
This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive.

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
